original_text:
“How long will you defend the unjust
    and show partiality to the wicked?
korean_text: 너희가 불공평한 판단을 하며 악인의 낯 보기를 언제까지 하려느냐 (셀라)

sentences.original_text: How long will you defend the unjust
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 불의한 자들을 얼마나 오래 변호할 것입니까

sentences.original_text: and show partiality to the wicked?
